TextAsset.value: Wait for detention to end.
Back for more, eh?
(Gosh, not even a good afternoon!)
(Al doesn’t waste a moment, does he?)
I’m always up for a little more, Al.
I thought as much after our last rendezvous.
(Wow a RONDAYVIEW or however you spell it. Very grown up and cool!)
Care to prove it though?
P-prove it?
Skip detention tomorrow.
With me.
(Hmm, must be for N.A.R.C. business.)
(Because fighting crime takes you to some dark corners of society, I bet.)
(Like skipping!)
Yeah, well.
Maybe I’ll think about it.
(Hmm, Al looks upset.)
(Like he’s having an argument.)
“The ringleader has left the circus.”
Oh, come on!
It couldn’t be more obvious!
(An argument...with his watch?!)
Tsk. It means the target has left the mission zone.
(Target? Mission Zone? Who’s he talking to???)
Yes, I know, it’s a lot of work being the chief.
But you could stand to read memos about official undercover agent lingo.
No, the target did not attend the completely fake N.A.R.C. meeting. Probably to conduct illegal cheat code activities.
No, I don’t believe target suspects anything.
Heya, Al.
TRANSMISSION CLOSED.
${slot:playerName}!
Uh, how much of that did you hear?
All of it. The whole thing.
Ah.
Well.
Sounded like you were talking in code.
During an argument.
With your watch.
Yes. That is what it sounded like.
I bet you know all about codes like…
C…
U…
Later?
(Wow secret codes already, play it cool, ${slot:playerName}!)
Yeah…
Maybe.
(Nailed it.)
(He just winked at me and turned away…)
Hey Aki!
Oh! Hi! Sorry about yesterday... I just can't afford to fall behind on my schedule.
It's okay... But maybe you have time today!
To have... Y'know... An entire conversation?
Yeah... Again, really sorry about that. I'll pencil in some conversation time.
(Um... Suddenly it feels like a lot of pressure... )
Actually... I have to practice for the school play tomorrow... Maybe you can help!
That sounds fun!
Great! Just let me know.
I have to practice for the school play tomorrow... Maybe you can help!
Hey Aki!
Hi ${slot:playerName}!
AH! I'll be right back!
(That was weird... )
Don't take it personally... She does it to everyone. She just has so much going on!
She's really amazing... But it also, like, makes it difficult to be her friend. She might be a little TOO busy.
Anyway, BYEEEE!
Sorry about that!
Everything okay?
It's GREAT! Hahahaha! Never better!
AH! Just... Just a moment!
(Okay... This is getting ridiculous.)
Phew... Sorry...
(There's definitely something suspicious happening here!)
(This bears investigation... )
Sorry about earlier…
(Definitely suspicious… I wonder what’s really going on.)
Hey buddy!
(He's looking around...)
I'm talking to you, Anti-Bravoman.
OH right... Haha... Of course....
Am I going to see you at Poetry Club later?
Er... Yeah... Definitely...
(He doesn't seem very sure... )
Cool... So I'll see you there...
(He's just fidgeting nervously... I pushed too hard yesterday, so I should probably let this one go... )
No one should be subject to...
The creeping lurkspace inside of me.
The sound of my voice... Is like a thousand black markers writing at once.
My eyes are--
OH! It's you.
Sorry... You were on a roll and I didn't want to interrupt...
Er... How are you?
I think... Everyone is talking about me.
Er... Are you sure?
They keep saying 'freak'.
That usually tips me off.
(Ouch...)
Well, I'm not going to call you that.
Nice to see you, Anti-Bravoman.
N-nice to see you too.
(It seems like he doesn't know how to act when someone's nice to him... )
You're in poetry club, right? Maybe I'll come by...
Um... I'll be there... Sure...
(Hmm... His heart doesn't seem like it's in it. Is he lying? I'd better not pry... he seems pretty sensitive underneath that dark aura.)
Gloaming… gloom… in the shade of my…….. long night of the soul…
(I’m going to ignore that… )
Maybe I’ll see you at poetry club!
Not if you’re lucky!
(Th-this guy-- !)
EEEEEEEEER
ATTA-TAT-TAT-TAT
KABOOM!
(What the...?)
Hey, Blue Max.
AHH!
(He’s as wound up as ever.)
Oh. Um. Hi, ${slot:playerName}.
(Sure is holding his arm funny.)
(Or, wing, I guess.)
What’cha got there?
Nothing. It’s nothing.
Ow!
(Gosh, he’s really wincing that arm. Or wing. Wonder how he hurt himself.)
Looks like you drew an airplane doing a bomb run on some army dudes.
(And for some reason the army dudes are wearing wrestleball uniforms…?)
No, it’s nothing.
Please leave me alone. I have to catch up on some homework.
Yo, Blue Dork!
AHH!
You done with my homework yet or what?
Almost.
I ain’t got all day!
Probably. I dunno.
It’s due whenever. Just it get done before then!
Hold on, you’re doing HIS homework?
It’s better than not doing it. Trust me.
Anyway, as long as I do his homework he won’t revenge on other students.
Especially smaller ones.
Like you.
Even so! That doesn’t make it right!
Yeah, well.
I have plans.
Meet me at the cafe for lunch tomorrow. We can talk more freely there.
Hi, ${slot:playerName}.
Hey, Max.
You get home okay yesterday?
Sure did. I used my advanced commando techniques!
Um, that’s good.
(Whatever those are!)
Thanks again for, y’know. For everything yesterday.
Anytime, Max. Hey, when’s our next meeting?
Oh, I wanted to talk to you about that!
We’re going to a new mission perimeter zone where rogue Wrestleball players will be less likely to ambush us.
So, we’re going to meet for lunch tomorrow.
AT THE CAFE!
Oh. But...that’s off school grounds, isn’t it?
It’s like skipping class.
It is, yeah. But what choice do we have with Taira roaming the halls of Namco High?
Anyway, it’ll give us a chance to talk about PROJECT SUPER SECRET PLANE.
Oh, and don’t be confused, ${slot:playerName}. It’s not actually a new program!
(Why is he whispering?)
PROJECT SUPER SECRET PLANE is my codename for SECRET PROJECT SUPER PLANE to make it even harder to guess than before!
(Um…)
Um…
Uh…
Oh, yeah. Yeah, I get it now.
Yup! So, I’ll see you at the cafe tomorrow, okay?
I’m busy, we’ll talk tomorrow, okay?
Wait, I wanted to talk to someone else…
Yeah, I just want detention to be over with.
Another day, everyone is here...
Remarkable!
King agrees! Keep up this excellent behavior!
See you at the bell.
(I wonder if anyone joined a club yesterday?)
(This punishment can’t end soon enough.)
hey again
theres no point to reading any of this
you already did the first event with me
so youll probably just keep picking me over and over
which is obviously the right decision
Huh?? I still can’t quite follow you…
Awfully sure I’ll “pick you” again though, huh?
Is that ironic confidence, or real confidence?
you dont have to pick me again you can pick someone else
i mean that works pretty well
if you dont want to get to the true ending with me that is
maybe thats not your scene whatever i dont judge
“True ending”??
I… I don’t… what does that mean?
dont worry about it pick whoever you want
pretty much everyone would be better than me
my whole thing is kinda ridiculous
I don’t know, Davesprite.
As weird as you are… there’s something about you that’s kinda cool, too.
yeah yeah keep it in your pants ${slot:playerName}
i get it
we did one event together so now were otp forever
thats cool i guess
“OTP”?
Ogling… Tiny… Presents?
Overly… Terrific… Pigeon?!
Ornery… Tiger… Prancing??!!
what
no
jesus
i could troll you on this but its already sad enough so whats the point
it would be a slam dunk but like way too easy so it doesnt count
its just a phrase that means were a couple now
relax
A… couple?
I-I don’t know about-
OHHH… I get it now!
“Only Two People”.
yup thats it
thats exactly what it means
why are you clicking on me again
you already talked to me
dont you have stuff to do
Hey, Davesprite. Still completely insane?
yeah gonna ignore that
ok so this is the part where i catch you up to speed on what would have happened if you picked me for the first event
that way it can be all seamless if you want to switch characters
well i guess its not completely seamless but whatever
like if you do taira and blue max at the same time
whoah
tonal shift
Yep, still insane!
I’d ask how that’s going for you, but…
I kinda want to leave you alone forever now!
hey words hurt buddy
okay if you had picked me on club day id have told you more about my stuff as a game guide
which will just go over your head like it is right now
total waste of excellent exposition in my opinion
Yeah, clearly I’m the one who’s dumb for not understanding your gibberish.
anyway you start to think that im hiding behind this elaborate game metaphor so i dont have to deal with real emotions like my crippling insecurity and stuff
which is really condescending of you by the way
like
you hang out with me for exactly one day
bam suddenly youre an expert on all my glaring character flaws
of which i have many but thats irrelevant
oh also we made some terrible webcomics together
(This guy… It’s hard to make heads or tails of what he’s saying, but…
When he talks about his “insecurity” or his “crippling flaws”...
It’s the first time I’ve seen real emotion cross his face.
At least, I think I see that… It’s hard to tell.
There must be something real there, making him feel that way.)
huh yeah youre kinda right
damn thats a pretty sadly accurate summary of my whole pointless existence
harsh
oh well at least youre totally into me now because of all my trouble and angst
Huh??
(It’s almost as if Davesprite could see my thoughts just now…
No, that’s impossible.)
yeah so that should pretty much catch you up to speed
you got a tantalizing peek into the twisted psyche of some dude
your mouth is watering to get a little more of that action i bet
even though im not even a real dude just like a copy of a dude mixed with a crow who came from a video game that destroys the world
anyway yeah were pretty much done here but if you want my true ending stick with me
or not i dont really care
(Davesprite… He seems crazy, but he has a strange internal logic.
He obviously needs help, though… That much is clear.
Maybe… maybe I could be the one to give it to him.)
Hi honey!
I hope you haven’t forgotten what I said, now!
Um…
Which part?
The part where, if you like, tell a single solitary soul that you saw me crying…
I’ll end your reputation at Namco High!
Not even the TOTAL SOCIAL REJECTS will hang out with you!
Haha… Okay, okay…
You seem like someone who’s not to be crossed.
I knew you could be taught!
Let’s see now…
How should we begin making you totally popular?
It’s gonna be hard, but…
I like, never EVER back down from a challenge!
That’s one of my many many charms.
I dunno…
Couldn’t you just… tell everyone that I’m really cool, or something?
If you’re SO popular, shouldn’t your recommendation make ME popular too?
Oh, ${slot:playerName}. So totally, like, naive.
You have no idea how popularity works in the real world!!
I’m starting to get an idea, though…
How attached are you to that outfit, by the way?
Just, like, for curiosity’s sake!
M-my outfit?
I… I like it!
There’s nothing wrong with it, is there?
Well, not EXACTLY… Tee hee!
I don’t like the sound of that.
Hello? Oh hi, Miranda.
Hey, do you think ${slot:playerName} is more of a summer or a winter?
Yeah, I’m talking about that dorky new kid…
Hi honey!
Did you have fun in your new club?
I hope you picked a really cool one!
Since you’re new at Namco High, being seen in a really cool club could, like, do wonders for your reputation.
Well, I’m sure my club isn’t as cool as yours.
...Duh!
The club I’m in HAS to be cool,because I’m in it!
(Is it just me…
Or did Donko seem a little… defensive?)
...Yknow honey, I’ve been thinking…
You may not be much now, but you’ve got potential.
If you play your cards right, you could drum up a lot of popularity here at Namco High!
Of course, you’d need someone who’s already popular to take you under their wing…
Someone like…
ME!
Wait…
Are you saying that you’ll…
Teach me to be popular?
I dunno about that, Donko.
I’m not really the… “popular” type.
Whaaat?
Anyone can be popular!
It’s just like any skill, like music or something…
You just have to like, work SUPER hard at it!
Uh…
I guess so, but…
Oh, it doesn’t even matter what I say now, does it?
You’ve already decided…
Tee-hee!
You’re getting to know me pretty well, honey!
Hey, uh, Galaga Ship.
Hm? Oh, hey, ${slot:playerName}.
(It’s so aloof!)
I was just wondering if you’d seen Aki around.
Hm? Not sure. Don’t think so.
(Barely paying attention to me!)

Well, uh, y’know. If she’s not around, then you can’t rehearse your lines because she’s playing Romeo because the director wanted that different take after seeing mine even though he didn’t see the other one but that Tomari is a little weird don’t you think I think so and anyway you need to rehearse I mean it’s not that you’re bad or anything but rehearsing is good for everyone and I’m just thinking that since I’m the understudy for Romeo and if Romeo isn’t around then you should maybe probably kinda think about rehearsing with me for your own good wow did that sound like a threat it sounded like a threat to me and I’m the guy who said it but huh it’s kinda weird I haven’t taken a breath this whole time right?
(Oops, lost track of what was coming outta my mouth, but I feel like it was pretty charming!)
…um?
(Uh-oh, must’ve dazzled Galaga Ship with all that charm!)
Yeah, um. Rehearsal is after school tomorrow.
I think that’s what you’re asking me about?
It was kind of hard to understand.
Hahahahaahaaha....haaaaaaa
Okay, yeah. Rehearsing is cool.
(Be cool, ${slot:playerName}.)
Maybe I can help out tomorrow! Maybe...
(Yeah, just be super casual. Maybe lean against this wall. Yeah, real cool, ${slot:playerName}.)
mumble MUMBLE mutter mumble.
(Galaga Ship’s awfully engrossed in whatever it’s reading…)
(Hm, looks like a script book?)
(Oh! For Drama Club I guess.)
~Sigh~
I’m never gonna get this monologue down.
Hm?
Oh, New Kid.
Sorry. Just a little frustrated with the play.
Aki never makes it to rehearsal, so I’m a little at sea.
And that’s, like, WAY worse when you’re a spaceship.
Well... maybe I could help?
I can read all kinds of words.
Oh? Oh!
Maybe...that could be fun...
Don’t know how I’m gonna get these lines down in time.
Hey Hiromi!
Hey, kid.
Collect any good data?
Lots.
And how's your, uh, data collection partner?
Sh-she's good...
Hey Hiromi! I’m glad you got all the data you needed.
Hi Hiromi!
Hey.
What'd you get up to yesterday?
I collected data.
with my data collection partner..
Data collection partner……....
Shut up, kid.
Er...
(So she's a little sensitive about it!)
.... What's 'collect data' mean?
Better that I show you.
(She doesn't seem like the scientist type... I wonder what it means... )
Hey Hiromi! Want help collecting data?
Helloooo, ${slot:playerName}! :B
Hi Jane! Did you have fun on Club Day?
I sure did! I’m the editor of the school newspaper, and not to toot my own horn, but I happen to be pleased as punch with the headline I came up with for yesterday!
Here, take a look!
“Tater Tots a Hit in the School Cafeteria”??
We cite several credible sources to back that up, too!
...Jane…
There’s so much weird stuff going on at this school…
Even the students and teachers are WAY out of the ordinary!
Couldn’t you have come up with something more exciting to report on?
${slot:playerName}, don’t be so ridiculous.
A good newspaper reports on the facts, and only the facts!!!
You don’t really expect me to believe something so silly as, say, a talking cat in our very own class, do you?!
Believe me, all that nonsense is the stuff of pranks and hoaxes.
I’m surprised a smart cookie like yourself would fall for it!
What about those weird friends you hang around with?!
Who? You mean Terezi and Davesprite?
They’re a lovely pair of chums, sure! But I don’t see how they have anything to do with this!
One’s a big orange floaty bird guy, and the other has gray skin and horns!!!
Sheesh! There’s no need to be rude!
They’re just… cosplay enthusiasts.
Are you sure about that?
${slot:playerName}… if you don’t mind me saying so, we should do some hanging out soon!
For one thing, I’ll be happy to try to disprove some of your ridiculous notions! :B
(Well, it isn’t like I’d really mind spending time with a cute girl like her…
And maybe… I… shall be the one… to do the notion-disproving!)
Let’s see what else is in this school paper of yours…
“Mustaches are Totally Hot: An Editorial by Jane Crocker?!”
HOO HOO! Yes! Well! Um!
That certainly is a thing I wrote! Ahem. …
Ahahahaha!
(...I wonder where I could get a fake mustache to wear.)
You have to admit, ${slot:playerName}, that when it comes to attractive facial hair…
Mustaches are just the tops!
(I don’t have to admit anything of the sort!)
Hi there Jane! Investigated any mysteries lately?
Hoo hoo! Only the mystery of what a great journalist I am! ;B
Yeah, that IS a real mystery!
Ohhh! Burn!
Dag nabbit. You took my excellent burn and turned it right back around against me!
How perfectly diabolical.
${slot:playerName}, you have the makings of a pranking mastermind.
Hmm, would you even go so far as to say that my burn was so good it was…
almost SUPERNATURAL?!
Nope. ;B
Darn! I thought I’d had ya!
Shoosh, ${slot:playerName}! Leave me alone!
I’m plotting our next journalistic expedition!
Haha, alright. Plot away!
Hey ${slot:playerName}. You look cheery today.
It’s annoying.
Um… sorry??
I was just gonna ask how your club day went.
It was pretty dumb. I’m in Yearbook Club.
I only joined because I knew it wouldn’t take any effort.
Aw, that sounds kinda fun, actually!
You would think that, wouldn’t you.
I guess it’s okay, it’s just… so pathetic.
Everyone always writes “keep in touch” in their yearbooks, but no one ever does…
Just like how no one ever calls when they say they will, or writes when they move away.
And if you do ever see them again, you find out they have a new friend who’s just like you but different.
That’s just how it always goes.
Not… always…
Yes. Always.
If it could happen with my friend Klonoa and me…
It could happen to anyone.
Huh? Who’s Klonoa?
Someone from another life… back when I was stupid enough to think I could actually study magic and become a priestess and go on adventures…
How childish is that?
Anyway… it’s none of your business.
Um… Okay…
Well, at least when you get a yearbook, you get a nice picture of yourself to remember your time?
I mean, at least you have that, right?
Heh. Why would I want a picture of myself? To remind me of how ugly I was in high school?
What?! You’re not ugly at all!
...You’re a real goody-two-shoes, ${slot:playerName}.
You shouldn’t hang out with me. I’ll just disappoint you.
(She says she picked Yearbook Club because it was easy…
But it also seems like the perfect embodiment of things she despises.
Did she join because she hates herself or something?! Lolo, what's the deal?)
Quit staring.
Hi, Lolo.
Hey. I thought you weren’t gonna waste your time with me.
Oh… did you mean that as like, a serious thing?
I thought it was more of a… wistful… self-deprecating phrase…
...Fine, whatever. Hang out if you want.
I could care less.
(Jeez, all I did was say hi!
She’s sorta protesting too much...)
It’s still against the rules!
It’s a technicality, so they’re okay.
Oh, hi Boss!
I can’t wait to go patrolling with you again!
...Nya! Er! That is!
Not specifically with YOU or nothin’...
I just like patrolling...
Haha... oh, jeez...
..You did have fun though, right Boss?
Haha! Of course I did!
I can’t wait to go patrolling with you again, either.
R-really…?
That’s… the nicest thing anybody’s ever said to me…
Haha… Oh, come on…
No, I mean it…
I really mean it.
‘Specially after I told you all about…
Y’know, where I come from and all…
And you haven’t said a word about it against me, or nothin’ like that…
You’re… really nice, Boss.
Of course I haven’t!
Meowkie, anyone who’d treat you differently because of that is a real jerk!
Ha ha…
Yeah…. you’re right…
Boss, I ain’t got too many friends here…
I’m glad you wanna hang out with me.
(How can MEOWKIE of all people not have many friends?
She’s cute, she’s nice, she’s a CAT…
People love cats, according to the Internet!
Maybe it has to do with where she comes from…
I better not push it too much, though.)
Hi Meowkie!
Oh, hiya Boss!
One second, okay?
Bye bye, King! Seeya tomorrow!
(See you tomorrow Miss Meowkie…)
(IN THE RING!!!)
(Just kidding!)
Heh heh! That King is pretty funny, huh?
So, didja find a good club yesterday?
Um… huh? Yeah yeah, the club was great…
But, what the heck?
Meowkie, are you actually FRIENDS with that scary guy King?!
Oh yeah. He ain’t too bad, actually.
He’s always real nice to me!
As a Hall Monitor, I gotta report to him every day.
That’s right, you’re a hall monitor!
Hey, maybe I could go on patrol with you sometime!
I keep thinking that might be kinda fun.
...R-really Boss?
You’d wanna… hang out with me?
Uh… yeah! Sure, why not?
Boss…
There’s somethin’ I oughta tell you.
(Uh oh…)
See, my family…
Well, my parents are…
They’re bad guys.
Not even important bad guys or nothin’...
Just goons, you know?
They used to work for a REALLY bad guy. We called him “The Big Cat” at home…
But, they didn’t want me to have that life.
They moved here to this neighborhood, so I could go to Namco High and…
And not grow up to be a bad guy.
But it’s in my blood, kinda… so… now you know.
I understand if you don’t wanna hang out no more...
Meowkie…
Thanks for telling me, but…
I don’t care where you come from!
You’re always really nice and helpful.
Don’t worry about that, okay?
I still want to hang out, if you do.
Boss… I…
...I really wanna hang out, too.
So, I gotta know…
What’s the deal with King?
Huh? Whaddya mean, “what’s the deal”?
You know… what’s he like!
Does he have any crazy secrets?
I dunno, Boss.
He’s a big wrestling guy with a jaguar head.
Pretty self-explanatory.
Aw, man...
Hi again, Digging Partner!
(He called me his... partner…)
Thank you so much again for what you did for me the other day.
I don’t know what I did to deserve such support…
I’m so proud to have brought digging to Namco High with our amazing, groundbreaking club.
(How could we have brought digging to Namco High if we’re the only ones in the digging club?
Doesn’t that just mean we brought digging to ourselves?
...Oh. “Groundbreaking”.
Heh heh. I get it.)
The old man hasn’t said anything to me about the club…
So we’re free to dig again tomorrow! I can’t wait!
Haha! He’s probably too depressed about his terrible life decisions to notice even a single thing his own son is doing!
Ha! Ha! Hahaha! Ha!
So I’ll see you at Digging Club tomorrow, right? Right?!
(This seems like a lot of drama to get myself involved in.
Maybe I should find a way to weasel out.)
After all, ${slot:playerName}…
I need you there.
You’re the only one who…
Whose presence qualifies us as an official club, on a technicality.
(...Or maybe I could give it one more shot.)
Hey ${slot:playerName}, you said you had no real interest in drilling or digging before the club…
Are you sure there wasn’t some other reason you joined?
(Oh no… Is my little crush THAT obvious?!)
Like for example… maybe the FATES THEMSELVES are guiding you into a previously unrecognized lifelong passion for digging?!!
Because that would be THE COOLEST!!!
Um… Yeah, it’s probably…
...something along those lines.
(Actually, it’s probably a little more like… a Tunnel of Love.)
Hey ${slot:playerName}. Did you find a good club to join?
I’m not sure yet… but club day sure was interesting anyway.
Yeah yeah that’s great. Unfortunately MY proposal for a club was rejected…
Can you believe that? Not one person wanted to dig with me!
It just doesn’t make sense. Maybe they misunderstood me and thought I said “Jigging Club” or something.
(I can’t decide which of those awful club ideas sounds less fun.)
Mr. Driller… why do you love digging so much anyway?
Are you kidding?! Digging is amazing!
It’s not just the fun of working hard and using cool power tools.
It’s the thrill of discovery…
Every time I go on a dig, I find something new, or uncover something old that I never knew had always been there…
There’s a whole world under the ground everyone walks on, waiting to be discovered.
It’s the best feeling in the whole world.
That does sound pretty cool, actually.
Yeah… too bad I’ll never be able to do it again, now that my club is rejected and my terrible father won’t let me…
Dads, huh? Don’t you wish you could dig into their heads and find out what’s in there?
Haha! Lots and lots of hate and bitterness, probably! Am I right?
(Um… Yikes…)
Of course, you shouldn’t dig into their heads LITERALLY…
That would mess them up pretty bad!
And we don’t want to do that, even if it’s only natural to think about it all the time!
Oh, I don’t have to tell you. I guess its pretty typical parent stuff!
Wow, Mr. Driller… I had no idea you hated Principal Dig Dug so much.
Whoah, whoah! I don’t HATE my dad!
No way! Uh uh! Where’d you dig up THAT crazy idea?!
He’s family after all…
And family’s more valuable than any treasure you could ever excavate!
...Although I don’t know for sure since that wretch won’t ever let me excavate anything again.
Uh huh… Well…
Good luck with that…
(He’s cute, but kinda crazy.
Still, when he talks about digging, it’s hard not to be inspired by his passion…
I kinda felt that way about rolling my katamari…
But that’s way too much trouble to ever try doing again.
Anyway...
Maybe it wouldn’t be so bad to hang around with Mr. Driller sometime.)
So, Mr. Driller, what’s your very FAVORITE part about drilling?
Oh man! There’s way too many great things about drilling to list!
But I’ll list them anyway.
And another thing that’s great about drilling is the sheer variety of bits available in the market today…
(I’m…
Sorry I asked…)
TWENTY MINUTES LATER.
Hi Nidia! What're you writing?
Oh! I'm making some notes for today! Tomari helped me devise a Personality Compatibility Matrix.
If you still have time to help, of course.
(Wow, she's really serious about this!)
Hi Nidia! What's up?
Well... I can use an amulet to combine with someone
and turn into a dragon
and it's my destiny to use that power to save the world!
But lately I haven't been able to find anyone to combine with.
That's why I'm using this Personality Compatibility Matrix that Tomari put together for me! He really seems to like helping me...
Anyway, on a completely unrelated note...
Do you think you could help me out tomorrow?
Only if you're not busy!
I'll explain at Magic Club! Just come find me behind the magic veil in the library!
(Wow... That's a lot to blurt out at once. Maybe I should see what's up with her...)

I hope you have time to come by Magic Club tomorrow, ${slot:playerName}…
I could really use your help!
${slot:playerName}!

Uh, staked-out, uh, on.
Um.
I’ll be keeping an eye on you.

Me?
Correct.

AND GO BACKWARDS FROM THERE.

You okay, Richard?
Never better!
I’ve got a lead. It could be the final piece of the pie at the heart of this puzzle.

Yo, Cuz! You’re lookin’ pretty good today!
Haha. You don’t like to give it a rest with the flirting, huh Taira?
Wha! Oh, n-no!
I just meant you’re like… healed and stuff after gettin’ hurt at the game yesterday!
...But you also look mad cute anyway!
YO, STOP TRYING TO MESS ME UP WITH YOUR BRAIN TEASERS, CUZ!
Ha! Don’t worry, I’m just teasing.
Yeah, I went to the nurse’s office and they fixed me up with a health potion.
This school is pretty cool…
WOO!
Yeah, that RULES!
Does that mean you’re all set to play Wrestleball again for the next match?!
Uh…
Um…
I dunno, Taira…
Maybe it’d be cool to just… hang out, instead?
YOOOO!
That’s a WAY more awesome idea!
You and me, Cuz! Hangin’ out!
Rad! I’m holdin’ ya to it!
(Me and my big mouth…
Couldn’t I have thought of a better excuse?!
Like… LITERALLY ANYTHING ELSE?)
WHOO! HANGING OUT RULES!
Haha… yeahhhh.
Yo! Hey, Cuz!
What club did you pick?
Well, I-
Whatever it is, there’s no WAY it’s as cool as the Wrestleball team!
How come you didn’t join, yo? You trying to hurt my feelings?!
I got mad revenge on the other team- you know, revenge for my clan and stuff?- and won the game singlehandedly!
HAW HAW! It was awesome! Plus my muscles looked totally hot!
Wh-what makes you think I’d want to see that?!
(Seriously?! I’m blushing over THIS GUY?!
And what’s the deal with the clan thing?)
Of course, if you wanna date me, you can see my muscles ALL THE TIME!
Maybe I could even help you bulk up a bit!
You obviously need it! HAW!
Whoah whoah whoah-
You actually want to DATE me?!
Uh, yeah, Cuz. Was that like, not clear?
You’re like… totally the coolest and really smart and stuff…
And really nice! And all that other stuff…
Haw! Look, you’re even making me go all EMOTIONS on you.
ME! A TOTALLY RAD UNDEAD WARRIOR BRO!
I dunno about this, Taira… And anyway, I’m not so good at sports.
Yeah, but you don’t gotta be good at somethin’ to like it!
That’s what’s cool about doin’ stuff you love…
You can do it even if you totally SUCK at it!
And if anybody ever tells you different…
I’ll get revenge on em for ya and PULVERIZE em!
...Huh!
(Wow, Taira is actually… not that bad.
He’s even kind of deep…
What’s up with the revenge thing, though?
There’s gotta be a story there…
Anyway, maybe it wouldn’t be so bad to hang out with him.)
So what’s your favorite part of revenge?
...Oh gee, how can I possible choose. Probably… all of it?

IT WAS GREAT!!!
